attributes.action: Investigate Breaches of Human rights by the British Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Amlwch 2 are the brothers Gordon and David Pritchard who for years tried to have a caravan site licence transferred from their Father's name to theirs so they could operate a caravan site in Great Britain
The petition is to investigate breaches of their Human Rights as directed under the European Law and the right to enjoy their possessions and property without hinderance or interferance.

rejection.details: Please take your case up with the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Information which may be protected by an injunction or court order
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
